remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当没有任何泛型类型定义或开放式构造的类型或任何封闭类型中的方法本身的类型自变量，则可以调用一个泛型方法。A generic method can be invoked only if there are no generic type definitions or open constructed types in the type arguments of the method itself or in any enclosing types. 类型可以是任意复杂，因为在进行此递归决定会很困难。Because types can be arbitrarily complex, making this recursive determination is difficult. 为方便起见，并减少错误的可能性属性提供一种标准的方式来区分封闭构造的方法，可以调用和开放构造方法，不能。For convenience, and to reduce the chance of error, the property provides a standard way to distinguish between closed constructed methods, which can be invoked, and open constructed methods, which cannot. 如果属性返回`true`，不能调用的方法。If the property returns `true`, the method cannot be invoked. 属性类型参数的以递归方式搜索。The property searches recursively for type parameters. 例如，它返回`true`开放类型中的任何方法`A`(`A(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)，即使该方法本身不是泛型。For example, it returns `true` for any method in an open type `A` (`A(Of T)` in Visual Basic), even though the method itself is not generic. 与此相反的行为属性，它返回`false`为这样的方法。Contrast this with the behavior of the property, which returns `false` for such a method. 同样， property 参数返回`true`开放类型中的任何构造函数，即使构造函数不能有其自己的类型参数。Similarly, the property parameter returns `true` for any constructor in an open type, even though constructors cannot have type parameters of their own. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件的列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 使用泛型反射中的其他术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

returns.span: 表示当前的执行方法的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the currently executing method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前正在执行的方法定义泛型类型上返回通过泛型类型定义 (即，返回`true`)。If the currently executing method is defined on a generic type, the that is returned by is obtained from the generic type definition (that is, returns `true`). 因此，它不反映时调用该方法时所使用的类型自变量。Therefore, it does not reflect the type arguments that were used when the method was called. 例如，如果方法`M()`泛型类型上定义`C`(`C(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)，和从调用`C.M()`，然后返回`C.M()`(`C(Of T).M()`在 Visual Basic 中)。For example, if a method `M()` is defined on a generic type `C` (`C(Of T)` in Visual Basic), and is called from `C.M()`, then returns `C.M()` (`C(Of T).M()` in Visual Basic). 如果当前正在执行的方法是泛型方法，返回泛型方法定义。If the currently executing method is a generic method, returns the generic method definition. 如果在泛型类型上定义的泛型方法从泛型类型定义中获取。If the generic method is defined on a generic type, the is obtained from the generic type definition. ## Examples 下面的示例定义两种类型。The following example defines two types. 第一种是一个非泛型类， `TestClass`，包括构造函数，一个名为方法`GetValue`，和一个名为的读写属性`GetValue`。The first is a non-generic class, `TestClass`, includes a constructor, a method named `GetValue`, and a read-write property named `GetValue`. 第二个是名为一个泛型类`TestClass`，包含一个构造函数，`GetValue`方法和泛型方法， `ConvertValue`。The second is a generic class named `TestClass` that includes a constructor, a `GetValue` method, and a generic method, `ConvertValue`. 每个构造函数、 方法和属性访问器包括对的调用方法。Each constructor, method, and property accessor includes a call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod/cs/GetCurentMethod1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod/vb/GetCurentMethod1.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns an empty array if the current method is not a generic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的数组的元素将泛型方法的类型参数的列表中出现的顺序。The elements of the returned array are in the order in which they appear in the list of type parameters for the generic method. - 如果当前方法是封闭式的构造的方法 (即，属性返回`false`)，返回的数组方法包含已分配给泛型方法的泛型类型参数的类型定义。If the current method is a closed constructed method (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic method definition. - 如果当前方法是泛型方法定义，该数组包含的类型参数。If the current method is a generic method definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果当前方法是打开的构造的方法 (即，属性返回`true`) 中的特定类型已分配给某些类型参数和类型的封闭泛型类型参数已分配给其他类型参数，该数组包含两个类型和类型参数。If the current method is an open constructed method (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have been assigned to some type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types have been assigned to other type parameters, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用属性来区分它们。Use the property to tell them apart. 这种情况的演示，请参阅为提供的代码示例属性。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example provided for the property. .NET Framework 2.0 版不支持泛型构造函数。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 此属性将引发如果未在派生类中重写，因此引发异常如果当前实例的类型是。This property throws if not overridden in a derived class, so an exception is thrown if the current instance is of type . 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件的列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 使用泛型反射中的其他术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无需重写才能使用它。You do not have to override the in order to use it. 你可以调用方法和对象，因为这些类的运行时版本中重写该方法。You can call the method on and objects, because the method is overridden in the runtime versions of these classes. 例如，运行时版本类派生自类，该类又派生自类。For example, the runtime version of the class derives from the class, which in turn derives from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为的测试方法`MethodBodyExample`并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取为测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取的列表对象并显示它们的类型和索引顺序。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their types and index order. 属性用于获取异常处理子句的列表。The property is used to obtain a list of exception-handling clauses. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言都可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例演示如何使用 Visual Basic 的筛选器子句`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是调用的便捷方法方法重载，并传入为`invokeAttr`和`null`为`binder`和`culture`。This is a convenience method that calls the method overload, passing for `invokeAttr` and `null` for `binder` and `culture`. 如果调用的方法引发异常，方法返回的异常。If the invoked method throws an exception, the method returns the exception. 若要调用静态方法使用其对象，则传递`null`为`obj`。To invoke a static method using its object, pass `null` for `obj`. > [!NOTE] > 如果此方法重载用于调用实例构造函数，为提供的对象`obj`重新初始化; 也就是说，执行所有实例初始值设定项。If this method overload is used to invoke an instance constructor, the object supplied for `obj` is reinitialized; that is, all instance initializers are executed. 返回值为 `null`。The return value is `null`. 如果调用类构造函数，则重新初始化类;也就是说，将执行所有的类初始值设定项。If a class constructor is invoked, the class is reinitialized; that is, all class initializers are executed. 返回值为 `null`。The return value is `null`. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. 如果当前方法的一个参数是值类型，并且中的对应参数`parameters`是`null`，运行时将传递值类型的初始化为零的实例。If a parameter of the current method is a value type, and the corresponding argument in `parameters` is `null`, the runtime passes a zero-initialized instance of the value type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用反射动态方法查找。The following code example demonstrates dynamic method lookup using reflection. 请注意，不能使用来调用在派生类中，重写的方法，因为后期绑定无法解析重写从基类的对象。Note that you cannot use the object from the base class to invoke the overridden method in the derived class, because late binding cannot resolve overrides. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodBase.Invoke1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.Invoke1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodBase.Invoke1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.Invoke1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodBase.Invoke1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.Invoke1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态调用反射的此实例的方法`obj`，并将指定的参数传递。Dynamically invokes the method reflected by this instance on `obj`, and passes along the specified parameters. 如果该方法是静态的`obj`参数将被忽略。If the method is static, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 对于非静态方法，`obj`应是继承或声明方法并且必须是与此类的类型相同的类的实例。For non-static methods, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the method and must be the same type as this class. 如果该方法不具有任何参数，值`parameters`应`null`。If the method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`. 否则为数量、 类型和中的元素顺序`parameters`应的数量、 类型和此实例反射的方法参数的顺序相同。Otherwise, the number, type, and order of elements in `parameters` should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the method reflected by this instance. 你不能省略对的调用中的可选参数`Invoke`。You may not omit optional parameters in calls to `Invoke`. 若要调用的方法省略可选参数，应调用`Type.InvokeMember`相反。To invoke a method omitting optional parameters, you should call `Type.InvokeMember` instead. > [!NOTE] > 如果此方法重载用于调用实例构造函数，为提供的对象`obj`重新初始化; 也就是说，执行所有实例初始值设定项。If this method overload is used to invoke an instance constructor, the object supplied for `obj` is reinitialized; that is, all instance initializers are executed. 返回值为 `null`。The return value is `null`. 如果调用类构造函数，则重新初始化类;也就是说，将执行所有的类初始值设定项。If a class constructor is invoked, the class is reinitialized; that is, all class initializers are executed. 返回值为 `null`。The return value is `null`. 对于通过值传递基元参数，执行正常的扩展 （Int16-> Int32，例如)。For pass-by-value primitive parameters, normal widening is performed (Int16 -> Int32, for example). 对于通过值传递引用参数，正常的引用扩展允许 （派生的类到基类，以及为接口类型的基类）。For pass-by-value reference parameters, normal reference widening is allowed (derived class to base class, and base class to interface type). 但是，对于按引用传递基元参数类型必须完全匹配。However, for pass-by-reference primitive parameters, the types must match exactly. 对于按引用传递引用参数，正常扩展仍然适用。For pass-by-reference reference parameters, the normal widening still applies. 例如，如果由反射的方法则此实例声明为`public boolean Compare(String a, String b)`，然后`parameters`应是数组的`Objects`长度为 2 以便`parameters[0] = new Object("SomeString1") and parameters[1] = new Object("SomeString2")`。For example, if the method reflected by this instance is declared as `public boolean Compare(String a, String b)`, then `parameters` should be an array of `Objects` with length 2 such that `parameters[0] = new Object("SomeString1") and parameters[1] = new Object("SomeString2")`. 如果当前方法的一个参数是值类型，并且中的对应参数`parameters`是`null`，运行时将传递值类型的初始化为零的实例。If a parameter of the current method is a value type, and the corresponding argument in `parameters` is `null`, the runtime passes a zero-initialized instance of the value type. 反射调用虚方法时使用动态方法查找。Reflection uses dynamic method lookup when invoking virtual methods. 例如，假设类 B 从类 A 继承，并且两者都实现一个名为 M 的虚拟方法。现在，假设你有`MethodInfo`对象，表示 M 对类 a。如果你使用`Invoke`方法来调用 M 类型 B 的对象，则反射将使用由类 b。 提供的实现即使类型 B 的对象被强制转换为一个，使用由类 B 提供的实现 （请参阅下面的代码示例）。For example, suppose that class B inherits from class A and both implement a virtual method named M. Now suppose that you have a `MethodInfo` object that represents M on class A. If you use the `Invoke` method to invoke M on an object of type B, then reflection will use the implementation given by class B. Even if the object of type B is cast to A, the implementation given by class B is used (see code sample below). 另一方面，如果方法为非虚拟的则反射将使用类型提供从其实现`MethodInfo`已获得，无论何种传递作为目标的对象类型。On the other hand, if the method is non-virtual, then reflection will use the implementation given by the type from which the `MethodInfo` was obtained, regardless of the type of the object passed as the target. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，是在私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性访问而完全受信任代码时，通过反射调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked via reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 如果调用的方法引发异常，`TargetInvocationException.GetException`返回发生的异常。If the invoked method throws an exception, `TargetInvocationException.GetException` returns the exception. 此实现引发`NotSupportedException`。This implementation throws a `NotSupportedException`. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的所有成员类使用的重载。The following example demonstrates all members of the class using an overload of . 私有方法`CanConvertFrom`对于给定的类型查找兼容的类型。The private method `CanConvertFrom` finds compatible types for a given type. 在一个自定义绑定方案中调用成员的另一个示例，请参阅[动态加载和使用类型](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamically-loading-and-using-types.md)。For another example of invoking members in a custom binding scenario, see [Dynamically Loading and Using Types](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamically-loading-and-using-types.md). [!code-cpp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CPP/binder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CS/binder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/VB/binder.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象成员声明基类和已没有实现提供。An abstract member is declared on a base class and has no implementation supplied. 若要获取，首先要获取类型。To get the , first get the type. 从类型，get 方法。From the type, get the method. 从方法获取`MethodBase`。From the method, get the `MethodBase`. 如果`MethodBase`或构造函数是公共以外，它受到保护，而且不能轻松访问。If the `MethodBase` or constructor is other than public, it is protected and cannot be readily accessed. 若要访问非公共方法，将设置屏蔽到`NonPublic`中`GetMethod`。To access a non-public method, set the mask to `NonPublic` in `GetMethod`. ## Examples 下面的示例确定是否指定方法是抽象类，并显示结果。The following example determines whether specified the method is abstract and displays the result. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否可重写一个方法，它是不足够检查是否是`true`。To determine if a method is overridable, it is not sufficient to check that is `true`. 为该方法将被重写，`IsVirtual`必须`true`和`IsFinal`必须`false`。For a method to be overridable, `IsVirtual` must be `true` and `IsFinal` must be `false`. 例如，一种方法可能是非虚拟的但它实现接口方法。For example, a method might be non-virtual, but it implements an interface method. 公共语言运行时需要实现接口成员的所有方法必须都标记为`virtual`; 因此，编译器将方法标记`virtual final`。The common language runtime requires that all methods that implement interface members must be marked as `virtual`; therefore, the compiler marks the method `virtual final`. 因此，在将方法标记为的情况下`virtual`但仍然不可重写。So there are cases where a method is marked as `virtual` but is still not overridable. 若要确定是否可重写一个方法就是，使用如下代码：To establish with certainty whether a method is overridable, use code such as this: `if (MethodInfo.IsVirtual && !MethodInfo.IsFinal)` 如果`IsVirtual`是`false`或`IsFinal`是`true`，则不重写方法。If `IsVirtual` is `false` or `IsFinal` is `true`, then the method cannot be overridden. ## Examples 下面的示例显示`false`为`IsFinal`，这可能导致你认为 MyMethod 是可重写。The following example displays `false` for `IsFinal`, which might lead you to think that MyMethod is overridable. 代码将打印`false`即使未标记 MyMethod`virtual`并因此不能重写。The code prints `false` even though MyMethod is not marked `virtual` and thus cannot be overridden. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if the current represents a generic method; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否当前对象表示泛型方法。Use the property to determine whether the current object represents a generic method. 使用属性来确定是否当前对象表示开放构造的方法或已关闭的构造的方法。Use the property to determine whether the current object represents an open constructed method or a closed constructed method. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下; 不支持这些泛型此属性返回`false`如果未在派生类中重写。Generics are not supported by default; this property returns `false` if not overridden in a derived class. 泛型构造函数中不支持.NET Framework 2.0 版中，因此此属性返回`false`如果当前实例的类型是。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0, so this property returns `false` if the current instance is of type . 下表总结了特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件。The following table summarizes the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods. 在泛型反射中，如使用的其他术语*泛型类型参数*和*泛型类型*，请参阅属性。For other terms used in generic reflection, such as *generic type parameter* and *generic type*, see the property. |术语Term|固定参数条件Invariant condition| |---|---| |泛型方法定义generic method definition| 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`.
定义泛型方法。Defines a generic method. 通过调用创建一个构造的方法方法对象表示泛型方法定义，并指定一个类型参数的字符串数组。A constructed method is created by calling the method on a object that represents a generic method definition, and specifying an array of type arguments.
可以仅在泛型方法定义上调用方法。The method can be called only on generic method definitions.
任何泛型方法定义是泛型方法，但反之不成立。Any generic method definition is a generic method, but the converse is not true.| |Generic Method — 泛型方法generic method|`IsGenericMethod` 属性为 `true`。The `IsGenericMethod` property is `true`.
可以是泛型方法定义、 打开的构造的方法或已关闭的构造的方法。Can be a generic method definition, an open constructed method, or a closed constructed method.| |打开构造的方法open constructed method| 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`.
不能调用开放构造的方法。It is not possible to invoke an open constructed method.| |关闭的构造的方法closed constructed method| 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`.
当检查以递归方式，该方法没有任何未分配的泛型参数。When examined recursively, the method has no unassigned generic parameters. 包含的类型不具有泛型类型参数，且没有任何类型自变量具有泛型类型参数。The containing type has no generic type parameters, and none of the type arguments have generic type parameters.
可以调用的方法。The method can be invoked.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前表示泛型方法定义，然后：If the current represents a generic method definition, then: - 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`. - 每个中返回的数组对象方法：For each object in the array returned by the method: - 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`. - 属性返回当前实例。The property returns the current instance. - 属性是相同的位置数组中的对象。The property is the same as the position of the object in the array. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下; 不支持这些泛型此属性返回`false`如果未在派生类中重写。Generics are not supported by default; this property returns `false` if not overridden in a derived class. 泛型构造函数中不支持.NET Framework 2.0 版中，因此此属性返回`false`如果当前实例的类型是。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0, so this property returns `false` if the current instance is of type . 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件的列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 使用泛型反射中的其他术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否只有一个签名完全相同的同一种类的成员在派生类中是隐藏的。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether only a member of the same kind with exactly the same signature is hidden in the derived class.

value.span: 如果此成员被签名隐藏，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the member is hidden by signature; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当派生类中的成员声明使用 C#`new`修饰符或 Visual Basic`Shadows`修饰符，它可以隐藏基类中同名的成员。When a member in a derived class is declared with the C# `new` modifier or the Visual Basic `Shadows` modifier, it can hide a member of the same name in the base class. C# 按签名隐藏基类成员。C# hides base class members by signature. 也就是说，如果基类成员具有多个重载，隐藏只有一个是具有相同签名的那个。That is, if the base class member has multiple overloads, the only one that is hidden is the one that has the identical signature. 与此相反，Visual Basic 隐藏所有基类重载。By contrast, Visual Basic hides all the base class overloads. 因此，返回`false`上使用 Visual Basic 中声明的成员`Shadows`修饰符，和`true`上使用 C# 声明的成员`new`修饰符。Thus, returns `false` on a member declared with the Visual Basic `Shadows` modifier, and `true` on a member declared with the C# `new` modifier. > [!WARNING] > 此属性不能决定的方法是否具有属性。This property does not determine whether a method has the attribute. 使用声明的方法`new`或`Shadows`修饰符将具有属性，但只有使用声明的方法`new`（即，仅 C# 方法） 将具有属性设置为`true`.A method that is declared with either the `new` or the `Shadows` modifier will have the attribute, but only methods declared with `new` (that is, only C# methods) will have the property set to `true`. 若要确定方法是否具有特性，请使用类似于以下代码：`if ((myMethodInfo.Attributes & MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) == MethodAttributes.NewSlot)`在 C# 或`If (myMethodInfo.Attributes And MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) = MethodAttributes.NewSlot`在 Visual Basic 中。To determine whether a method has the attribute, use code similar to the following: `if ((myMethodInfo.Attributes & MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) == MethodAttributes.NewSlot)` in C# or `If (myMethodInfo.Attributes And MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) = MethodAttributes.NewSlot` in Visual Basic. 但请注意，，尽管使用的所有方法都声明`new`或`Shadows`具有属性，并非所有的方法具有属性都声明具有`new`或`Shadows`。Note, however, that although all methods declared with `new` or `Shadows` have the attribute, not all methods that have the attribute are declared with `new` or `Shadows`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含具有重载方法、 的基类和派生的类隐藏了其中一个重载。The following code example contains a base class with an overloaded method, and a derived class that hides one of the overloads. 在 Visual Basic 版本的代码示例中，属性返回`false`派生类中的成员。In the Visual Basic version of the code example, the property returns `false` for the member in the derived class. 在 C# 版本的代码示例，该属性返回`true`派生类中的成员。In the C# version of the code sample, the property returns `true` for the member in the derived class. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/cpp/hide.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/CS/hide.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/VB/hide.vb#1)]

value.span: 如果当前方法或构造函数在当前信任级别上是安全关键的或安全可靠关键的，则为 ；如果它是透明的，则为 。

span.span: if the current method or constructor is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性报告的方法或在其当前的信任级别，由公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的构造函数的透明度级别。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the method or constructor at its current trust level, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表中显示的这些属性的组合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全级别Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |严重Critical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |可靠关键Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用这些属性是比检查程序集及其类型和成员的安全批注、 检查当前的信任级别，以及尝试复制运行时的规则要简单得多。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types and members, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于部分信任程序集，此属性的值取决于程序集的当前信任级别。For partial-trust assemblies, the value of this property depends on the current trust level of the assembly. 如果程序集加载到部分受信任的应用程序域中 （例如，到沙盒应用程序域中），运行时将忽略程序集的安全批注。If the assembly is loaded into a partially trusted application domain (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 程序集和其所有类型被视为透明。The assembly and all its types are treated as transparent. 运行时才会注意到部分信任程序集的安全批注仅当该程序集加载到完全信任的应用程序域中 （例如，到桌面应用程序的默认应用程序域）。The runtime pays attention to the security annotations of a partial-trust assembly only when that assembly is loaded into a fully trusted application domain (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 与此相反，受信任的程序集 （即，具有强名称程序集安装在全局程序集缓存），是始终以而不考虑应用程序域的信任级别的完全信任方式加载，因此其当前的信任级别始终是完全受信任。By contrast, a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is always loaded with full trust regardless of the trust level of the application domain, so its current trust level is always fully trusted. 你可以使用来确定程序集和应用程序域的当前信任级别和属性。You can determine the current trust levels of assemblies and application domains by using the and properties. 有关反射和透明度的详细信息，请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。For more information about reflection and transparency, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). 透明度有关的信息，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虚拟成员可以引用类中的实例数据，并且必须通过类的实例引用。A virtual member may reference instance data in a class and must be referenced through an instance of the class. 若要确定是否可重写一个方法，它是不足够检查是否`IsVirtual`是`true`。To determine if a method is overridable, it is not sufficient to check that `IsVirtual` is `true`. 为该方法将被重写，`IsVirtual`必须`true`和必须`false`。For a method to be overridable, `IsVirtual` must be `true` and must be `false`. 例如，一种方法可能是非虚拟的但它实现接口方法。For example, a method might be non-virtual, but it implements an interface method. 公共语言运行时需要实现接口成员的所有方法必须都标记为`virtual`; 因此，编译器将方法标记`virtual final`。The common language runtime requires that all methods that implement interface members must be marked as `virtual`; therefore, the compiler marks the method `virtual final`. 因此，在将方法标记为的情况下`virtual`但仍然不可重写。So there are cases where a method is marked as `virtual` but is still not overridable. 若要确定是否可重写一个方法就是，使用如下代码：To establish with certainty whether a method is overridable, use code such as this: ```csharp if (MethodInfo.IsVirtual && !MethodInfo.IsFinal) ``` ```vb If MethodInfo.IsVirtual AndAlso Not MethodInfo.IsFinal Then ``` 如果`IsVirtual`是`false`或`IsFinal`是`true`，则不重写方法。If `IsVirtual` is `false` or `IsFinal` is `true`, then the method cannot be overridden. 你可以确定是否当前的方法重写的基类中的一个方法通过调用方法。You can determine whether the current method overrides a method in a base class by calling the method. 下面的示例实现`IsOverride`可完成此方法。The following example implements an `IsOverride` method that does this. [!code-csharp[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/IsOverride1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/IsOverride1.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的示例显示`false`为`IsFinal`，这可能导致您认为`MyMethod`是可重写。The following example displays `false` for `IsFinal`, which might lead you to think that `MyMethod` is overridable. 代码将打印`false`即使`MyMethod`未标记为`virtual`并因此不能重写。The code prints `false` even though `MyMethod` is not marked `virtual` and thus cannot be overridden. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: void _MethodBase.Invoke (uint dispIdMember, ref Guid riid, uint lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodBase.Invoke(unsigned int32 dispIdMember, [in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, unsigned int32 lcid, int16 wFlags, native int pDispParams, native int pVarResult, native int pExcepInfo, native int puArgErr) cil managed

Sub Invoke (dispIdMember As UInteger, ByRef riid As Guid, lcid As UInteger, wFlags As Short, pDispParams As IntPtr, pVarResult As IntPtr, pExcepInfo As IntPtr, puArgErr As IntPtr) Implements _MethodBase.Invoke

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodBase.Invoke(System::UInt32 dispIdMember, Guid % riid, System::UInt32 lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_MethodBase::Invoke;

param.name: dispIdMember
param.span: 标识成员。

span.span: Identifies the member.

param.name: riid
param.span: 留待将来使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必须为 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 要在其中解释参数的区域设置上下文。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.

param.name: wFlags
param.span: 描述调用的上下文的标志。

span.span: Flags describing the context of the call.

param.name: pDispParams
param.span: 指向一个结构的指针，该结构包含一个自变量数组、一个命名自变量的 DISPID 自变量数组和数组中元素数的计数。

span.span: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.

param.name: pVarResult
param.span: 指向要存储结果的位置的指针。

span.span: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.

param.name: pExcepInfo
param.span: 指向一个包含异常信息的结构的指针。

span.span: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.

param.name: puArgErr
param.span: 第一个出错自变量的索引。

span.span: The index of the first argument that has an error.

summary.span: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

span.span: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::Invoke`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
